item.title: Probably the noobiest question here
item.dc:creator: @mc_wobbla mc wobbla
item.description:
@mc_wobbla wrote:

lol well i got it from google
some other guy had the same problem and some guy wrote this

[QUOTE=T1G3R;2526983]case button id: if(c.getItems().freeSlots() == 28) { c.sendMessage("You have no items in your backpack."); } else { for(int i = 0; i <= 27; i++) { c.getItems().bankItem(c.playerItems[i] , i, c.getItems().itemAmount(c.playerItems[i])); } }
Thats Project Insanity, convert it to delta.[/QUOTE]

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:3, topic:419756”]I see some problems in that code, but I’ll convert it for you and let you work the kinks out.

case #: if (freeSlots() == 28) { sM("You have no items in your backpack."); } else { for (int i = 0; i < 28; i++) { bankItem(playerItems[i], i, playerItemsN[i]; } }

Actually I only see one problem. :|[/quote]

is the one problem the case number? lol

Read full topic

case button id: if(c.getItems().freeSlots() == 28) { c.sendMessage("You have no items in your backpack."); } else { for(int i = 0; i <= 27; i++) { c.getItems().bankItem(c.playerItems[i] , i, c.getItems().itemAmount(c.playerItems[i])); } }
